DataElement.preferredName: Laboratory Finding Pre-study Corrected QT Interval Less Than Integer::480 Millisecond Outcome Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The coded indicator response regarding whether a patient's corrected baseline QT Interval is < 480 msec.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Laboratory Finding Pre-study Corrected QT Interval Less Than Integer::480 Millisecond Outcome
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The result of a lab test to measure an attribute or to determine the presence, absence or degree of a condition._Occurring before enrollment/treatment on-study._The time interval between the start of the Q wave and the end of the T wave in the cardiac cycle as corrected with a non-specified correction formula._A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::480_A unit of time equal to one thousandth of a second (10E-3 second)._The result of an action.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The result of a lab test to measure an attribute or to determine the presence, absence or degree of a condition.

Concepts.definition: The result of a lab test to measure an attribute or to determine the presence, absence or degree of a condition.

Property.preferredName: Pre-study Corrected QT Interval Less Than Integer::480 Millisecond Outcome
Property.preferredDefinition: Occurring before enrollment/treatment on-study.:The time interval between the start of the Q wave and the end of the T wave in the cardiac cycle as corrected with a non-specified correction formula.:A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status.:A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::480:A unit of time equal to one thousandth of a second (10E-3 second).:The result of an action.

Concepts.definition: The time interval between the start of the Q wave and the end of the T wave in the cardiac cycle as corrected with a non-specified correction formula.
A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
A unit of time equal to one thousandth of a second (10E-3 second).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable._The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials
